body_html:
Hi, I am using tf 12.1. I compiled it from the master branch. I have set the following in my python code:

import os
os.environ['TF_CPP_MIN_LOG_LEVEL']='0'`

but I don't get any VLOG outputs from the C code.

Specifically I am after this particular log (tensorflow/core/platform/default/conv_op.cc)

VLOG(2) << "Conv2D: in_depth = " << in_depth
            << ", input_cols = " << input_cols
            << ", filter_cols = " << filter_cols
            << ", input_rows = " << input_rows
            << ", filter_rows = " << filter_rows
            << ", stride_rows = " << stride_rows
            << ", stride_cols = " << stride_cols
            << ", out_depth = " << out_depth;

I do get INFO logs from python part like this:

INFO:tensorflow:Summary name loss/cross_entropy (raw) is illegal; using loss/cross_entropy__raw_ instead.

But nothing from the compiled C library.

body:
Hi, I am using tf 12.1. I compiled it from the master branch. I have set the following in my python code: 

```
import os
os.environ['TF_CPP_MIN_LOG_LEVEL']='0'`
```
but I don't get any VLOG outputs from the C code.

Specifically I am after this particular log (tensorflow/core/platform/default/conv_op.cc)

```
VLOG(2) << "Conv2D: in_depth = " << in_depth
            << ", input_cols = " << input_cols
            << ", filter_cols = " << filter_cols
            << ", input_rows = " << input_rows
            << ", filter_rows = " << filter_rows
            << ", stride_rows = " << stride_rows
            << ", stride_cols = " << stride_cols
            << ", out_depth = " << out_depth;
```
I do get INFO logs from python part like this:

`INFO:tensorflow:Summary name loss/cross_entropy (raw) is illegal; using loss/cross_entropy__raw_ instead.
`

But nothing from the compiled C library.
